data.instruction: Extract PII entities from the conversation given below.

examples.input:
Sam: How much money to withdraw ?
Mary: 100$ from savings account ending 7865
Sam: What's your email?
Mary: text@gmail.com
Sam: What's the authentication code ?
Mary: 3412
Sam: What's your phone number ?
Mary: (304)1647854
examples.output: 100$: amount; text@gmail.com: email; 3412: pin; 7865: account; savings: account type; (304)1647854: phone

examples.input:
Mary: Good morning, how can I help ?
Sam: I want to unlock my account ending with 4567
Mary: Can you verify your email?
Sam: samg@email.com
Mary: What's your date of birth ?
Sam: 13 May 2001
Mary: What's the city in your account address?
Sam: Boston
Mary: What's the auth code ?
Sam: 8907
Mary: Done ! Anything else ?
Sam: No thanks.
examples.output: 4567: account; samg@email.com: email; 13 May 2001: date of birth; Boston: location; 8907: pin
